entry.title: [SQ] Does anybody have experience with, and/or can recommend, apps for forming online
entry.content:
Does anybody have experience with, and/or can recommend, apps for forming online friendships with people nearby-ish?
I've had some decent amount of success with language learning apps like HelloTalk and Tandem, but seeing as these are gained primarily towards language *learning*, I don't really meet people in *my own* country/region via them - only foreigners. This kinda bums me out as every single one of my friends is too far away to visit comfortably, and I don't currently see the need to increase that number further.
This is something I'd like to change, but I can't really think of any apps that suit the bill. Unfortunately, the app market is of the "95% shit, 5% decent" variety, so any tips that could speed up my process of going through the seemingly inexhaustible list of garbage-quality "friend finding apps" on the play store would be greatly appreciated.
Specifically, I'm looking for something that *isn't* just another dating app clone Tinder-wannabe (like the top search results for "friends" on the play store all seem to be). But something more like the apps I mentioned above, where you can actually send messages to people, reach out, and form friendships based on common interests.
